channel.title: How do I do it?
channel.description: [b][/b][i][u][s][shadow=red,left]How do I make a server? I want to make one really bad but I don't know how. Can someone help me?[/shadow][/s][/u][/i]

item.title: How do I do it?
item.dc:creator: @Fox0wnage Fox0wnage
item.description:
@Fox0wnage wrote:

Firstly, wrong section.
There’s a tutorial on this: Link>> http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,342685.0.html

Go to the download page and look for a source and client that appeals to you.
Most importantly learn at least the basics of Java before starting. I started without learning and partly learnt through this community. You could do the same as well. But it’s reccommended to learn the basics.
Hope it helped

Read full topic
